ComicInfo.Summary:
The crossover event of the year comes to its thrilling conclusion. The Turtles have one last, desperate shot at going home. But will they take it, knowing what nefarious plans Shredder has for Gotham City? Itâ€™s full-on ninja warfare as our heroes go up against the combined forces of the Foot Clan and the League of Assassins.
